ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Exception when instantiating Processor (when launching crawl job with a custom processor)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Christian, thanks a lot, your suggestion works perfectly. Now, for my own curiosity, is it easy to understand why a constructor did not work? Internally,
